701509f-a.title: Bronx: Mosholu Parkway - Grand Concourse
701509f-a.text:
Mosholu Parkway (left), south from its intersection with Grand Concourse (right). The vantage point is the Mosholu Parkway station
of the Jerome Ave. subway line.
August 25, 1927.
P. L. Sperr.
701509f-a.folder: Mosholu Parkway & Grand Concourse, Bronx, NY

701510f-a.title: Bronx: Mosholu Parkway - Grand Concourse
701510f-a.text:
(1)
Mosholu Parkway, at Grand Concourse. In the center background, across the elevated structure of the I.R.T. subway on Jerome Avenue, is the tower of the I.R.T. high service station.
The view is in a southwesterly direction.
August 25, 1927.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
DDetail of the same.
May 8, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
701510f-a.folder: Mosholu Parkway & Grand Concourse, Bronx, NY

701508f-a.title: Bronx: Mosholu Parkway - Grand Concourse
701508f-a.text:
Mosholu and Concourse
After Emergency Work Bureau Men had cleared land, planted and made fences and benches.
Apr. 1931

Photo by Mr. A. Tennyson Beals
Emergency Work Bureau
1931
